helpString: Extension to set an alarm programmatically for devices > API Level 9, Android 3.0 (Honeycomb). Version 1 as of 2016-08-26 for App Inventor version nb150 and Companion version 2.38.

events.description: Event raised after setting the alarm.
events.name: AfterSet

name: TaifunAlarm
